org.missile.model
Interface GameEngineObserver

All Known Implementing Classes:
Canvas
public interface GameEngineObserver

Interface that is implemented by all those classes which want to receive updates from the GameEngine class.

The purpose of this interface is to decouple as much as possible the view layer and the model business layer. In this case, this representation follows the Observer design pattern.

Author:
Luis Carlos Mateos

Method Summary
